item.title: Go conc
item.author: serialt
item.description: Go conc 参考链接 https://www.liwenzhou.com/posts/Go/conc/ go package main import ( "fmt" "time" ) func main() { for i := 0; i < 5; i++ { go func(num int) { fmt.Println(num) }(i) } time.Sleep(5 * time.Second) } sync.WaitGroup 控制并发 package main import ( "fmt" "sync" ) var wg sync.WaitGroup func hello(i int) { defer wg.Done() fmt.Println("Hello Goroutine!", i) } func main() { for i := 0;
